actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to provide that the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency shall have authority to regulate air pollution on and over the Outer Continental Shelf.

summary.text: Amends the Clean Air Act to direct the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to provide that any source of air pollution resulting from activities in or on the waters above or on the Outer Continental Shelf is subject to the requirements of the Clean Air Act applicable to the adjacent State or local jurisdiction.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to provide that the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency shall have authority to regulate air pollution on and over the Outer Continental Shelf.
